## zelos.RenderInfo.getNegativeSpacing\_() method

Calculate the spacing to reduce the left and right edges by based on the outer and inner connection shape.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getNegativeSpacing_(elem: Measurable): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elem | Measurable | The first or last element on a block.  The amount of spacing to reduce the first or last spacer. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
